content:
I, #{userName}, hereby pledge to visit the gym on #{selected_days} starting from today until #{auto_destruct}, between #{time_range}.

I will complete a workout session and submit a selfie at the gym as proof of completion.

This is my promise to myself â€” to build strength, stay consistent, and keep showing up. ğŸ‹ï¸ğŸ“¸
requirements: Gym access or personal workout equipment

basicQuest.title: Visit Gym
basicQuest.instructions:
Show up and move. A short, consistent workout is better than occasional extremes.

Choose exercises that match your level. Focus on form, breathe, and leave a little stronger than when you arrived.

AiSnap.taskDescription: a selfie of a person at the gym or using gym equipment
